p: The online tool, Metascape 73 was used to perform the enrichment analyses of gene ontology (GO), and Kyoto encyclopedia and genomes (KEGG), including protein-protein interaction and transcriptional factor of TRRUST. EnrichmentMap was established using the g.profiler ( https://biit.cs.ut.ee/gprofiler/gost) with the gene list as input and results were visualized in Cytoscape (v3.7.2) with cutoff at 0.01 of “FDR q-value” 74.
